localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
blogPost.body: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
blogPost.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See who’s watching and engaging with your content
blogPost.author: Scott Smith

localize.description: 即时查看谁浏览了你的内容。除了总浏览次数，你还可以看到用户对屏幕录像、视频和图片的总浏览百分比。这些分析可以让你专注于创建具有更高参与度的内容。
localize.tagline: 查看谁在观看和参与你的内容。

localize.description: 即時查看誰瀏覽了你的內容。除了總瀏覽次數，你還可以看到用戶對屏幕錄像、視頻和圖片的總瀏覽百分比。這些分析可以讓你專注於創建具有更高參與度的內容。
localize.tagline: 查看誰在觀看和參與你的內容。
